decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Notwithstanding the information given on the submitted drawing, the width of the access shall be 2.4 metres.  REASON:  In the interests of highway safety. | No part of the access shall be brought into use before the dropped kerb has been constructed as approved so as to allow insofar as they can be achieved within the land under the control of the applicant sight lines of 2.4m by 2.4m and that the land shall be kept clear of any obstructions to visibility above a height of 0.6m.  REASON:  In the interests of highway safety.
description: Provide vehicle access to Eastcote Lane and hardstanding area in front garden of maisonette
